description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Parsnips with Honey & Mustard recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Easter,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roasted Parsnips with Honey & Mustard Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190°C. Lightly grease a roasting pan with a little oil.
Refer to image on how to peel parsnips and halve or quarter lengthways if large.
Mix honey, mustard and olive oil together in a small bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Arrange parsnips, in a single layer into the roasting pan and drizzle over the honey mustard mixture. Roast for 35–40 minutes, turning halfway through, until tender and golden.
